'''1.9.3-pre3''' is third and final pre-release for [[Java Edition 1.9.3]], released on May 3, 2016,<ref name="blogpost">{{cite|url=https://web.archive.org/web/20160505024422/http://mojang.com/2016/05/minecraft-193-pre-release-3/|title=Minecraft 1.9.3 Pre-Release 3|website=Mojang.com|date=May 2 2016|author=[[Searge]]}}</ref> which removes the server blocking test from the previous pre-release and fixes bugs.

== Changes ==
=== General ===
'''Networking'''
* The game no longer checks https://sessionserver.mojang.com/blockedservers,<ref>[{{reddit|4hmlcb/minecraft_193_prerelease_3|d2qux1d}} "The Mojang EULA /blockedservers check was removed in this release."] – /u/openfiber, April 3, 2016</ref> as it had begun to in [[1.9.3-pre2|the previous pre-release]].

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|otherissuescount=1|fixedin=1.9.3 Pre-Release 3|prefix=Minecraft
|;previous
|101545|Problem with the new pre-release.
}}
'''Other fixes:'''
* Fixed a potential crash with spreading water or lava.<ref name="blogpost" /></onlyinclude>
